description:
8.33 aloop
Loop audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:

loop.description: Set the number of loops. Setting this value to -1 will result in infinite loops.

time.description: Set the time of loop start in seconds. Only used if option named 'start' is set to -1.

name: aloop

parameters.description: Set the number of loops. Setting this value to -1 will result in infinite loops. Default is 0.
parameters.name: loop

parameters.description: Set maximal number of samples. Default is 0.
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Set first sample of loop. Default is 0.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Set the time of loop start in seconds. Only used if option named start is set to -1.
parameters.name: time

source:
8.33 aloop

Loop audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:

loop

Set the number of loops. Setting this value to -1 will result in infinite loops. Default is 0.

size

Set maximal number of samples. Default is 0.

start

Set first sample of loop. Default is 0.

time

Set the time of loop start in seconds. Only used if option named start is set to -1.
